head.title: The Stiff Guy vs. The Dumb Guy

hedline.hl1: The Stiff Guy vs. The Dumb Guy

block.p: It is not surprising that late-night television comics are able to influence the outcomes of presidential elections (Marshall Sella, Sept. 24). Shallow, gaffe-a-day press coverage of politicians is more entertainment than news; members of Congress spend more time fund-raising than legislating; and candidates are willing to say just about anything to get elected. Our political system has been a joke for years.
